short_description: riverside guesthouse is a bed and breakfast based in charlestown, ireland.
long_description: we are a family run business at the crossroads of mayo, sligo, roscommon and we have been welcoming visitors to charlestown since 1966. we are situated in the town centre only steps away from the all the public transport that passes through to the airport, galway city, castlebar, westport and sligo town, dublin city centre and dublin airport. there is a choice of cereals, and juices. delicious gourmet coffee and a selection of teas. all our rooms have been recently tastefully renovated, have comfortable beds and all are en-suite with tv.
business_tags: bed & breakfasts | bed and breakfast accommodations | the wild atlantic way | restaurants and bars | gourmet coffees | holiday tour | guest houses | brown bread | cereals | jams
generated_description: riverside restaurant & guesthouse is a family-run business located in charlestown, county mayo, ireland. established in 1966, the establishment offers bed and breakfast accommodation and serves a variety of freshly cooked irish breakfasts. situated at the crossroads of mayo, sligo, roscommon, and galway, it is conveniently located near ireland west airport knock and is just 3 km from knock shrine. the guesthouse features recently renovated en-suite rooms with comfortable beds and modern amenities. riverside is known for its welcoming service and has been recognized with awards for its culinary offerings.
